Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement subscription management, advanced search, prospect comparison, and mobile UX features

This commit adds multiple major features to the platform:

## Subscription Management (Story 4.1)
- Added subscription service with Stripe integration for payment processing
- Implemented tiered pricing plans (Free, Pro, Premium)
- Created dunning service for failed payment recovery
- Added usage tracking and quota enforcement
- Implemented proration for plan upgrades/downgrades

## Advanced Search & Discovery (Story 3.4)
- Built advanced search service with complex filtering capabilities
- Added saved search functionality for users
- Implemented breakout detection service to identify rising prospects
- Created discovery endpoints for personalized recommendations
- Added search result caching for improved performance

## Prospect Comparison Tool (Story 3.3)
- Enhanced comparison service with side-by-side prospect analysis
- Added statistical trend comparisons between prospects
- Implemented scouting radar comparison visualizations
- Created comparison export functionality
- Added historical analog comparisons

## Mobile-Optimized User Experience (Story 3.5)
- Implemented responsive components with mobile-first design
- Added touch gesture support for swipe navigation
- Created offline functionality with service workers
- Optimized performance for mobile devices
- Added progressive web app capabilities

## Additional Improvements
- Enhanced API endpoints with better error handling
- Added comprehensive test coverage for new features
- Updated UI components with shadcn/ui integration
- Improved TypeScript type definitions
- Added QA gate documentation for all new features
